channel.title: Home on Nico Stuart
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Nico Stuart

item.title: from cinza: issue 2 Now Available
item.description: I’ve just published the second issue of from cinza on HeyZine. I am especially proud of this issue, as it’s been a very long time coming. This issue contains several poems I’ve written and photos I’ve taken, as well as a photo of me done by my friend Cris. Check it out and I hope you enjoy! Please note, this issue contains adult imagery and themes. 18+.

item.title: Possessed by My Dead Boyfriend's Haunted Dildo
item.description: Coping with grief through the use of a haunted dildo. Modern romance with a mystic twist. Available now on my Literotica page.

item.title: From Cinza: Volume 1, Issue 1
item.description: Volume one, issue one of my zine From Cinza is available now via HeyZine. Contains adult content. 18+

item.title: my first night at the baths
item.description: A short erotica written in prose. Published for free on Literotica.

item.title: Published in Male Muse - Pulp: vol. 6
item.description: My poem ‘you asked me if i practice magic’ was published in Pulp vol. 6

item.title: My short play Headless Jerk was Published in WUSSY vol. 3 - The Sex Issue
item.description: After the death of his mother, Rex creates a cam model persona as a coping mechanism. Isolated from his family, Rex begins to spiral as he puts more and more time into camming without properly grieving.

item.title: My track Dido featured in indie film King of Bloody Fookin' Britain
item.description: Blending opera arias with the sweaty thumping of club music, my track Dido sets a fun, yet mysterious vibe in the scene where it is featured. Watch now for free on Tubi.
